overview: When a young Australian hitchhiker, Judy (Peers), enters a  prohibited forest area, she encounters Paul (Gil) whose job is  spotting fires from a plane. She is invited to stay with him and  his teen son, Billy. Later they go on a sightseeing flight in a  "Tiger Moth" bi-plane, but having a forced landing, are  accommodated by an odd elderly couple.
tagline: A love story of our Time
title: Solo
